Information.Subtext: Displays the Service Severity.
Shows elements included in service and their alarm levels.
The key of this table, value is element name or the name provided as alias in the service setup.
The element name if the row represents an element.
The [DMA ID]/[Element ID] for the element or service.
The highest severity of the included alarms.
Whether the element is Included, Excluded or Not Used.
Indicates the calculate alarm level and if the element is included or not.
The name of the parent service if the element or service is not directly included in this service.
The ID of the parent service if the element or service is not directly included in this service.
An index of the included element or service in its parent service.
Amount of critical alarms of the element that are active in this service.
Amount of major alarms of the element that are active in this service.
Amount of minor alarms of the element that are active in this service.
Amount of warning alarms of the element that are active in this service.
Amount of timeout alarms of the element that are active in this service.
The type of entity this row represents, possible values are: - Element - Service: A service, or the service part of an enhanced service.
Enables the monitoring of the active alarms on service
Shows all active alarms in the service.
Alarm Root ID of the active service alarm
Alarm ID of the active service alarm
Severity of the active service alarm
time of the active service alarm
Element of the active service alarm
Parameter Description of the active service alarm
Parameter Key
Value of the alarm active service the Alarm
Status of the active service alarm
Alarm Type of the active service alarm
User state of the active service alarm
Source of the active service alarm
Category of the active service alarm

Changes.Fix: Disabled monitoring on service severity (can lead to service update storm)

Changes.Change: Adjusted Time (Active Service Alarms) column width
Made protocol conform with latest Skyline protocol style guide

Changes.NewFeature: Added support for service child elements.
Added columns for alarm count, RN:19917.

Changes.Change: Fixed type and discreets of Severity (Active Service Alarms), PID=203.
